full_output.summary: I am a B.Tech student with a strong foundation in programming and experience in developing and deploying models using diverse algorithms. My analytical mindset, attention to detail, and collaborative skills enable me to thrive in dynamic environments. I am eager to contribute and drive positive change through innovative solutions.

certifications.title: Python for Data Science and AI

education.field_of_study: Computer Science and Engineering with specialization in AI&ML

projects.name: Invoice Entity Extraction Tool using NER Model
projects.description: Developed a natural language processing solution to extract details from invoices using advanced technologies like Conditional Random Fields (CRF) and Natural Language Toolkit (NLTK) in Python. Built the CRF model with default hyperparameters: - LBFGS optimization algorithm - L1 and L2 regularization parameters set to 0.1 - 100 epochs giving an F1, precision, and recall scores were 94%, 94%, and 95% respectively.

projects.name: HAND GESTURE BASED VOLUME CONTROL
projects.description: Authored a sophisticated volume control system using computer vision techniques and various python libraries such as Scikit- Learn. Enabled users to adjust audio levels through natural hand gestures, enhancing user experience.

projects.name: MUSIC RECOMMENDATION SYSTEM
projects.description: Content-Based Recommender is used which analyzes user's past song history and the properties of the music, the system will generate a list of recommended tracks. The model uses the Spotify dataset which contains a variety of features such as acousticness, liveness, loudness, tempo, and others.

experiences.description: Served as a project intern and assisted in project planning for successful completion within timeline constraints. Managed multiple priorities effectively while delivering consistent results under tight deadlines throughout the internship.
